title: The World's Biggest Library
description: The World's Biggest Library tells the story of the largest library in the world, the Library of Congress. Readers will learn why this historic institution was created, and why it is important to the United States. This book also gives students a look at some of the interesting items found in the library. The book can be used to teach students how to understand main idea and details and to recognize proper nouns.
highFrequencyWords: acquired, appointed, artifacts, attraction, collection, communication, documents, draft, exhibits, mosaics, preserve, research
